Datix

Incident Reporting and Risk Management

A Culture of Patient Safety through reporting

The Risk Management team and I created a video on how to capture and assess important details in Datix, a web-based risk management software, to make incident reporting the easiest thing to do on our caregiver’s list.

I created an eLearning video to show our caregivers how to:

  • Access Datix.
  • Use the Event Status Dashboard.
  • Document the Management Review.
  • Attach documents and use templates.
  • Understand the Leader Sign-Off process.

Video Analytics

Video has become one of the most engaging form of content. They can make information more digestible and easier to understand than a text article.

But for most organizations, simply having video content available isn’t enough. You need to know if people are actually watching your videos.

Chapters

Chapter points were provided to make it easy for viewers to quickly jump to the section they want without having to search for it. This was also a good way to see the most seeked part of the video.

Viewer Retention

Using xAPI, I was able to capture actions like when the video was played, paused, completed, seeked, skipped, and where in the video people are dropping off.

You can interact with the demo video below to see what your statements would look like.

The activity log might take a few seconds to load.

Refresh page to view activity results.
